scripts.start:frontend: dotenv -f .env -- sh -c 'cd frontend && npm run dev'
scripts.setup:local: cp .env.local.template .env.local && echo '✅ Created .env.local - please edit with your secrets'
scripts.setup:prod: cp .env.template .env && echo '✅ Created .env - please edit with your production secrets'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
